title: LeagueFroze
body: My LoL Froze on my MacBook and I can't turn off or restart my computer. How can I fix it?

replies.body: Wow, a total freeze is really strange, sorry about that.  :(  Is there any overheating going on?  Look around your mac and make sure nothing is getting clogged up.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look as well and see what's going on.  We'll reach out to you directly as soon as we can.
